lyrics:
Ripping my heart was so easy, so easy
Launch your assault now, take it easy
Raise your weapon
Raise your weapon
One word, and it's over
Ripping through like a missile
Ripping through my heart
Robbed me of this love
Raise your weapon
Raise your weapon
And it's over

Preserve your ego
You won't feel a thing
Always number one
The pen with the bent wrist
Crooked king
Sign away our peace, for your war
One word and it's over
Dropping your bombs now
On all we built
How does it feel now to watch it burn?
Raise your weapons, raise your weapons
And it's over
